accept_tutorial: Read the instructions and finish the tutorial
add_pink_dresses: Add two units of the women’s "Pink Summer Dress" (size M) to shopping cart
offer_green_coat: Find the free code for the women’s “Green Coat” in its images and apply it
add_green_coat: Add the product "Green Coat" to shopping cart
add_bomber_jacket: Add the product men's "Bomber Jacket" to favorites and shopping cart
delete_item: Delete the product "Green Coat" from shopping cart
make_purchase: Buy shopping cart and fill in the shipping information
double_button: Double tap the button to go to the final questionnaire
